subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Until recently, Carri Wood was cashing so few paychecks on the L.P.G.A. Tour, she took a second job at a Tommy Bahama clothing store.
snippet: Until recently, Carri Wood was cashing so few paychecks on the L.P.G.A. Tour, she took a second job at a Tommy Bahama clothing store.
